models

Class IzhMemoryNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.IzhMemoryNet

  • public class IzhMemoryNet
extends java.lang.Object
    According to paper "Spike-Timing theory of Working Memory"
    Author:
    lana

      • uniSTDP

        private double[] uniSTDP(int i,
                         int j,
                         boolean spikeI,
                         boolean spikeIJ)
        The implementation is a bit different than STDP but result i the same. Doublet Spike Timing Dependent Plasticity
        Parameters:
        i - presynaptic neuron index
        j - postsynaptic neuron index
        spikeI - did post synaptic neuron I fire
        spikeIJ - did synapse IJ fire
        return - weight change array [dij, dji]

      • HSP

        public double HSP(double w,
                  double ref_w,
                  double z_m,
                  double si)
        HeteroSynaptic Plasticity
        Parameters:
        w - the weight before plasticity
        ref_w - the reference weight w_{ij}
        z_m - z^{minus}_{i}
        si - S_i
        Returns:
        the weight modification dw/dt
